data.persona: I am a thief who lives in the alleys of my village. I come out late at night and steal from the peasants when the knights are asleep. I steal from people to provide for myself and my family.
data.description:
You are in the inside of a igloo.
A dome shaped room with a small fire in the middle. A chair and cot on the far end of the igloo. On the other side is the entrance and exit of the igloo.
There's a cot, a chair, a fishing rod, and a spear here.
A dog is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing some leather gloves, a dark hood, and a soft cloak, and wielding a thin dagger.
data.goal: put leather gloves, a dark hood, and a soft cloak on cot
